sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import productsData from "src/assets/data/products.json"; @Component({ selector: "app-root", templateUrl: "./app.component.html", styleUrls: ["./app.component.scss"], }) export class AppComponent { products: any[] = productsData; }

{{ product.name }}

Price: {{ product.price }}

Manufacturer: {{ product.manufacturer }}

Properties: {{ product.properties.join(", ") }}
